scripts.deploy:local: npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/AMMUpgradeable.ts --parameters ignition/parameters.json --network localhost
scripts.deploy:testnet: npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/AMMUpgradeable.ts --parameters ignition/parameters.json --network goerli
scripts.deploy:mainnet: npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/AMMUpgradeable.ts --parameters ignition/parameters.json --network mainnet
